metaspace2anndata package

Submodules

metaspace2anndata.converter module

metaspace2anndata.converter.dataset_to_anndata(ds, database=('HMDB', 'v4'), fdr=0.1, results=None, all_annotation_images=None)[source]

Convert METASPACE datasets to AnnData object.

Requires only a dataset (SMDataset), database (e.g. (“HMDB”, “v4”)), and fdr. Output of SMDataset.results and SMDataset.all_ion_images can be provided to work, since the function does not allow to specify all parameters.

This function does not download the optical image for datasets.

Metadata is stored in adata.uns.

Parameters:

  • ds (SMDataset) – METASPACE dataset object

  • database (Optional[Tuple[str, str]]) – Database to download results. Is not used if results and all_annotation_images is provided.

  • fdr (Optional[float]) – FDR threshold. Is not used if results and all_annotation_images is provided.

  • results (Optional[DataFrame]) – Output of SMDataset.results() call.

  • all_annotation_images (Optional[List[IsotopeImages]]) – Output of SMDataset.all_ion_images() call.

Return type:

AnnData

Returns:

AnnData object including images, metadata, and annotation information.

metaspace2anndata.converter.dataset_to_anndata_oi(ds, database=('HMDB', 'v4'), fdr=0.1, results=None, all_annotation_images=None)[source]

Convert METASPACE datasets to AnnData object with optical image.

Requires only a dataset (SMDataset), database (e.g. (“HMDB”, “v4”)), and fdr. Output of SMDataset.results and SMDataset.all_ion_images can be provided to work, since the function does not allow to specify all parameters.

THis function return the AnnData object with optical image, and ion images transformed to fit optical image.

Metadata is stored in adata.uns. The optical image is stored in adata.uns[“spatial”][“image”][“images”][“hires”]

Parameters:

  • ds (SMDataset) – METASPACE dataset object

  • database (Tuple[str, str]) – Database to download results. Is not used if results and all_annotation_images is provided.

  • fdr (float) – FDR threshold. Is not used if results and all_annotation_images is provided.

  • results (Optional[DataFrame]) – Output of SMDataset.results() call.

  • all_annotation_images (Optional[List[IsotopeImages]]) – Output of SMDataset.all_ion_images() call.

Returns:

AnnData object including images, metadata, and annotation information.

Raises:

ValueError – If no optical image is available for dataset.
